sentences.en: But certain unique characteristics of the 1918 pandemic have long remained enigmatic.
sentences.cn: 不过,1918年的大流行有几个特点,还是未解的谜.

sentences.en: Goebbels looked anxious, Himmler as calm and enigmatic as usual.
sentences.cn: 戈培尔看起来很焦急, 希姆莱仍然象平常一样平静和难以捉摸.

sentences.en: Ground conditions are not necessarily enigmatic in densely covered areas, even in rain forests.
sentences.cn: 在浓密森林覆盖区, 甚至在雨林区,地面情况未必都是莫明其妙的.

sentences.en: Haley studied her, an enigmatic smile on his face.
sentences.cn: 黑利打量着她，脸上带着神秘的笑容。

sentences.en: I didn't grasp the meaning of that enigmatic comment until much later.
sentences.cn: 直到很晚的时候,我才理解那段莫名其妙的话的意思.

sentences.en: In addition, he also frequently encountered a number of expressionless, enigmatic visages.
sentences.cn: 还有许多毫无表情 、 似笑非笑的脸,也是他在家里常常看见的.

sentences.en: Part of what makes him so enigmatic is the nature of his intellect.
sentences.cn: 使盖茨神秘莫测的部分原因在于他的智慧特点.

sentences.en: Scorpio a Water element, and this makes it a somewhat enigmatic sign.
sentences.cn: 天蝎座是水象星座, 这使其具有了某种神秘的特质.

sentences.en: Scorpio is a Water element , and this makes it a somewhat enigmatic sign.
sentences.cn: 天蝎座:水相星座的特质使蝎子有些神秘.

sentences.en: She starred in one of Welles's most enigmatic films.
sentences.cn: 她在韦尔斯最具神秘色彩的一部电影中出演主角。

sentences.en: The mechanism of this remarkable transformation remains enigmatic.
sentences.cn: 这个明显的转变机理仍然是不清楚的.

sentences.en: The patterns in these niches are elegant and enigmatic.
sentences.cn: 图饰设计奇制诡异,细致灵巧.

sentences.en: Upon their arrival, an impressive and enigmatic culture began to develop.
sentences.cn: 岛上的传说声称它们是“自己走来的”,但经研究,由于雕像重心很低, 所以十几个人就可以把它举起并迅速移动.

sentences.en: Yvan Attal is very convincing in an enigmatic character.
sentences.cn: 伊万-·阿达勒所饰演的迷一样的男主人公非常有说服力.

words.tran_cn: 难解的；谜一般的；不可思议的
神秘地；莫明其妙地；让人捉摸不透地

trans.tran_cn: 神秘的，似谜的，令人困惑的，高深莫测的
trans.tran_en: Someone or something that is enigmatic is mysterious and difficult to understand
